description: This file defines a NetworkModule object that provides singleton instances for networking components such as Moshi, OkHttpClient, Retrofit, and an API service, configuring HTTP request handling for the mobile app, with emphasis on base URL configuration and logging.

methods.name: moshi
methods.description: Lazy-initialized singleton Moshi instance with KotlinJsonAdapterFactory.

methods.name: logging
methods.description: Lazy-initialized HttpLoggingInterceptor configured to log BASIC level logs.

methods.name: headersInterceptor
methods.description: Interceptor that adds 'Accept: application/json' header to HTTP requests.

methods.name: okHttp
methods.description: Lazy-initialized OkHttpClient with interceptors and timeout settings.

methods.name: retrofit
methods.description: Lazy-initialized Retrofit instance configured with base URL, OkHttpClient, and Moshi converter.
